creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: five separate rings attached to wire-wrapped clasp by spiral hooks; clasp has beehive-like hook and eye closure; each ring has identical relief motifs which are separated from each other by two vertical bars; motifs include rat, dog, cow, monkey, goat, snake and dragon-like images; motifs increase in size with size of ring
title: Torque
